expression.expression: NTILE(5) OVER (ORDER BY MONETARY DESC NULLS FIRST)
NTILE(5) OVER (ORDER BY FREQUENCY DESC NULLS FIRST)
NTILE(5) OVER (ORDER BY RECENCY ASC NULLS LAST)

customer_count_per_segment.COUNT_DISTINCT_CUSTOMER_ID
* 100.0
/ CASE
    WHEN total_customer_count.COUNT_DISTINCT_CUSTOMER_ID_ = 0
      THEN NULL
    ELSE total_customer_count.COUNT_DISTINCT_CUSTOMER_ID_
  END
